channel.title: Azure Updates Feed
channel.description: Currently the Azure Updates page has no RSS enabled - this is a temp feed made by scraping that page for updates

item.title: Retirement: Azure PostgreSQL migration extension in Azure Data Studio (ADS)
item.description: The Azure PostgreSQL migration extension in Azure Data Studio is being retired to focus on more advanced and supported migration services within the Azure Database for PostgreSQL portal and CLI. This change ensures customers have access to up-to-date features for their migration needs.

item.title: Generally Available: Java on Azure Container Apps
item.description: Experience a new way to run Java applications on Azure Container Apps.

item.title: Public Preview: Low-Code RAG ingestion with built-in document parsing and chunking in Logic Apps Standard
item.description: We are thrilled to introduce the Public Preview of built-in actions for document parsing and chunking in Logic Apps Standard, designed to streamline RAG-based ingestion for Generative AI applications. With these out-of-the-box operations, you can now easily ingest documents or files, including both structured and unstructured data, into AI Search without writing or managing any code!

item.title: Private Preview: Azure Site Recovery support for Azure Trusted Launch VMs (Linux OS)
item.description: Azure Site Recovery support for Azure Trusted Launch VMs (Linux OS) is now available for private preview.

item.title: Public Preview: DNAT on Azure Firewall Private IP address
item.description: Azure Firewall enhances the Destination Network Address Translation (DNAT) rule configuration to support port translation on its Private IP address.

item.title: Retirement: Azure AI Document Intelligence GA API v2.1 is retiring on 15 September 2027
item.description: Azure AI Document Intelligence GA AI v2.1 will be retiring soon. Please migrate to newer API version to continue operation.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Web PubSub – MQTT support now available
item.description: Seamlessly deliver content over low-bandwidth, high latency, or unreliable networks.

item.title: Public Preview: Live Resize for Azure Premium SSD v2 and Ultra Disks
item.description: This feature is the ability to increase your Premium SSD v2 and Ultra disk storage capacity without stopping your VM.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Application Gateway v2 Basic SKU
item.description: Designed for customers, especially developers or small enterprises who are looking for a cost-effective Application Load Balancer solution and don’t require high scalability and advanced features.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Functions support for PowerShell 7.4
item.description: You can now take advantage of PowerShell 7.4 capabilities with your Functions apps.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure SQL Database Hyperscale elastic pools
item.description: Azure SQL Database Hyperscale elastic pools are now generally available.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure IoT Edge now supports new version releases of Ubuntu Server, Debian, and Yocto
item.description: IoT Edge now supports Ubuntu Server 24.04, Debian 12, and Yocto Scarthgap.

item.title: Retirement: Azure App Service Environment v1/v2 is retired as of August 31, 2024
item.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure App Service Environment v1/v2 on August 31, 2024.

item.title: Generally Available: Auto-renewal of certificates for on-premises to Azure Site Recovery
item.description: Auto-renewal of certificates for on-premises to Azure Site Recovery.

item.title: Public Preview: Expanded GenAI Gateway capabilities in Azure API Management
item.description: We are excited to announce new enhancements to our GenAI Gateway capabilities, specifically designed for large language model (LLM) use cases. Building on our initial release in May 2024, we are introducing new policies to support a wider range of LLMs via the Azure AI Model Inference API. These new policies offer the same robust functionality as our initial offerings but are now compatible with a broader array of models available in Azure AI Studio.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Container Storage enabled by Azure Arc Edge Volumes
item.description: Learn more about the Public Preview announcement of Azure Container Storage enabled by Azure Arc Edge Volumes.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Storage Mover with Bandwidth Management
item.description: Azure Storage Mover with WAN link bandwidth management schedules is now generally available.

item.title: Generally Available: VMSS Automatic Instance Repairs – Reimage, Restart Repair Actions
item.description: We are excited to announce that customers can now choose between Replace, Reimage (New), or Restart (New) as the default repair action performed in response to an "Unhealthy" application signal.

item.title: Public Preview – Templates Support in Azure Logic Apps Standard
item.description: We're excited to announce the Public Preview of Templates Support in Azure Logic Apps Standard, providing pre-built workflow solutions to streamline and accelerate integration projects. This new feature allows developers to quickly set up, customize, and deploy workflows, simplifying the process of building and managing applications.

item.title: Public Preview – Out of box monitoring dashboards for Logic Apps Standard
item.description: We’re excited to introduce Insights support for Azure Logic Apps Standard, offering curated visualizations to help you monitor your applications and workflows more effectively. With these new dashboards, you gain a comprehensive view of your Logic Apps Standard environments, enabling better oversight of your integration scenarios.

item.title: Public Preview: Entra ID support for SSH connections in portal
item.description: Entra ID support for SSH connections is now supported in the portal experience for a quicker, more secure, one click experience.

item.title: Retirement: Azure API Management STV1 compute platform is retired as of August 31, 2024
item.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure API Management stv1 on August 31, 2024.

item.title: Retirement: Azure Logic Apps Integration Service Environment is retired as of August 31, 2024
item.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure Logic Apps Integration Service Environment (ISE) on August 31, 2024.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Public IPs are zone redundant by default
item.description: Azure Public IPs are now zone redundant by default in 12 regions.

item.title: Public Preview – Managed linting support in API Center
item.description: We are excited to announce the public preview of managed linting support for API Analysis in Azure API Center. This feature offers robust linting capabilities to ensure your API definitions comply with organizational style rules, providing detailed reports and seamless integration for enhanced API quality.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Now Supports Clusters Up to 250 Nodes
item.description: Unlock unprecedented scalability for your Kubernetes deployments. Azure Red Hat OpenShift now supports clusters with up to 250 nodes, empowering enterprises to run larger workloads with enhanced performance.

item.title: Retirement: Azure API Management STV1 compute platform is retired as of August 31, 2024
item.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure API Management stv1 on August 31, 2024.

item.title: Retirement: Azure Logic Apps Integration Service Environment is retired as of August 31, 2024
item.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure Logic Apps Integration Service Environment (ISE) on August 31, 2024.

item.title: Retirement: Azure HDInsight on AKS will retire on January 31, 2025
item.description: Azure HDInsight on AKS is nearing retirement.

item.title: Generally Available: Larger Enterprise tier cache instances for Azure Cache for Redis
item.description: Take advantage of larger and more powerful options for your Redis workloads.

item.title: Retirement: Migrating to TLS 1.2+ with the Deprecation of Outdated Security Protocols
item.description: Remove any outstanding dependencies on TLS 1.0 and 1.1 before October 31, 2024

item.title: Retirement: Azure Monitor experience (preview) in HDInsight is retiring by February 1, 2025
item.description: Migrate from Azure Monitor experience (preview) in Azure HDInsight to Azure Monitor Agent (AMA) before January 31, 2025

item.title: Public Preview: JavaScript (JS) Challenge on Azure WAF integrated with Azure Front Door
item.description: Increase your security posture and generate a non-intrusive mitigation when a request matches a WAF bot rule or custom rule using Azure WAF JS challenge.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure NetApp Files storage with cool access for all service levels
item.description: Azure NetApp Files storage with cool access is now generally available with support for all service levels.

item.title: Generally Available: Workspaces in Azure API Management
item.description: Workspaces in Azure API Management, now generally available, enable organizations to manage APIs more productively, securely, and reliably by isolating API runtime and administrative access for teams.

item.title: Public Preview: Instance Mix on Virtual Machine Scale Sets
item.description: You can now specify multiple different VM sizes and an allocation strategy in Virtual Machine Scale Sets with flexible orchestration mode.

item.title: Generally Available: Attach and detach of VMs on Virtual Machine Scale Sets for a single fault domain
item.description: The ability to attach and detach of Virtual Machines on Virtual Machine Scale Sets with a fault domain count of 1 is now generally available.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Sphere (Integrated) announces Locate Device feature
item.description: Easily find the Azure Sphere catalog that a given device has been claimed to, and the device group to which it is currently assigned.

item.title: Retirement: Azure API Management STV1 compute platform is retired as of August 31, 2024
item.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure API Management stv1 on August 31, 2024.

item.title: Retirement: Azure Logic Apps Integration Service Environment is retired as of August 31, 2024
item.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure Logic Apps Integration Service Environment (ISE) on August 31, 2024.

item.title: Public Preview: Customer managed planned failover for Azure Storage
item.description: Azure Storage is excited to announce customer managed planned failover is now available in public preview.

item.title: Retirement: Azure App Service Environment v1/v2 will be retired on 31 August 2024
item.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure App Service Environment v1/v2 on 31 August 2024.

item.title: Public Preview: Private registry support in Azure Deployment Environments
item.description: Use private Azure Container Registry (ACR) with the extensibility model in Azure Deployment Environments for more secure, customizable deployments.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure NetApp Files now supports 50 GiB minimum volume sizes
item.description: Volume enhancement: Azure NetApp Files now supports 50 GiB minimum volume sizes.

item.title: Generally Available: Dedicated log analytics tables in Application Gateway
item.description: Resource specific tables provide a dedicated and optimized way to store and query logs for Application Gateway. The resource specific tables allow for better data manipulation and enhanced performance in terms of ingestion latency and query times.

item.title: Generally Available: Cross Region Restore of SQL and HANA database backups from a vault with Private Endpoints enabled
item.description: Azure Backup now supports performing Cross-Region Restore of SQL and HANA backups from a vault which has Private Endpoints enabled.

item.title: Retirement: Upcoming TLS changes for Azure Event Grid
item.description: Ensure that your client applications can support TLS 1.2 or TLS 1.3.

item.title: Generally Available: Double encryption at-rest for Azure NetApp Files
item.description: Multiple encryption layers for increased data security.

item.title: Public Preview: FIPS mutability support in AKS
item.description: You can now enable or disable FIPS on an existing node pool in AKS.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure CNI Powered by Cilium & Azure CNI Overlay support in AKS
item.description: You now have greater control over your network traffic within your Kubernetes environment in AKS.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure CNI overlay Windows support in AKS
item.description: You can now implement and manage dual-stack IPv4 and IPv6 network configurations on your Windows nodepools in AKS clusters.

item.title: Generally Available: New features in AKS extension for Visual Studio Code
item.description: This AKS extension update for the Visual Studio Code includes several new features including deployment file generation, GitHub Actions, and more.

item.title: Generally Available: Enable multifactor authentication for your tenant by 15 October 2024
item.description: Enable multifactor authentication to maintain access to admin portals.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Chaos Studio supports a new Network Isolation fault for virtual machines
item.description: Azure Chaos Studio now supports a new Network Isolation fault for virtual machines

item.title: Retirement: Azure Synapse Runtime for Apache Spark 3.2 disablement
item.description: Effective September 12th, 2024, disablement of jobs running on Azure Synapse Runtime for Apache Spark 3.2 will be executed.

item.title: Public Preview: High Scale mode for Azure Monitor – Container Insights
item.description: Using the new High Scale mode in Container Insights, customers can send up to 50K logs per second per node from their AKS clusters.

item.title: Generally Available: Terraform support for geo-restore in Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server
item.description: Use Terraform to perform geo-restore for Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server.

item.title: Generally Available: Enforce passwordless authentication with Azure Cache for Redis
item.description: Disable access keys for Azure Cache for Redis authentication when using Microsoft Entra ID.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Policy support for Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server
item.description: Help ensure compliance and security with Azure Policy support for Azure PostgreSQL - Flexible Server.

item.title: Generally Available: Navigate your data more easily in Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer
item.description: Discover enhanced navigation and data management with the latest Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer update.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure SQL updates for mid-August 2024
item.description: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-August 2024.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Database for MySQL Flexible Server supports Managed HSM
item.description: Use HSM-backed encryption keys to protect data at rest in Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server.

item.title: Generally Available: Dev Containers templates for Azure SQL Database
item.description: Simplify your development process with Dev Container templates for Azure SQL Database.

item.title: Public Preview: Los Angeles - Azure Extended Zones
item.description: Customers now have the capability to operate latency-sensitive workloads in close proximity to end-users, all within a framework that supports data residency needs.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure NetApp Files cross-zone replication
item.description: Replicate Azure NetApp Files volumes from one availability zone to another in a fast and cost-effective way, protecting your data from unforeseeable zone failures

item.title: Generally Available: Azure NetApp Files zone volume placement enhancement – Populate existing volume
item.description: Populate previously deployed, existing volumes with the logical availability zone information to enable failure domain protection for workloads in specific availability zones.

item.title: Generally Available: Operator and CRD support with Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus
item.description: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus now supports Prometheus Operator model and Custom Resource Definitions for Service and Pod Monitors.

item.title: Retirement: Azure Synapse Runtime for Apache Spark 3.1 disablement
item.description: Effective August 29th, 2024, disablement of jobs running on Azure Synapse Runtime for Apache Spark 3.1 will be executed.

item.title: Public Preview: Pre-release version - Azure API Center Visual Studio Code extension now adding a pre-release version
item.description: Azure API Center Visual Studio Code extension is now adding a pre-release version allowing developers to get an early look at some of the upcoming features.

item.title: Generally Available: Model fine-tuning support for Kubernetes AI Toolchain Operator (KAITO)
item.description: Fine-tuning and inferencing with adapters is now supported on open-source Kubernetes AI Toolchain Operator (KAITO).

item.title: Generally Available: OS SKU in-place migration for AKS
item.description: You can now trigger a node image upgrade between one Linux SKU to another on an existing nodepool in AKS.

item.title: Public Preview: Windows Annual Channel on AKS
item.description: Get the latest release in Windows Server and portability between container hosts and container images.

item.title: Generally Available: App Configuration references on App Service
item.description: App Configuration references are now available on App Service

item.title: Public Preview: Azure NetApp Files volume encryption key transition
item.description: Customers can now transition existing volumes from platform-managed keys (PMK) to customer-managed keys (CMK) without data migration

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Carbon Optimization
item.description: Empowering Azure developers and IT professionals to optimize the carbon footprint from cloud usage.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Blob Storage Lifecycle Management now supports improved control on archiving
item.description: Lifecycle management rules in Azure Blob Storage and Azure Data Lake Storage now provide more control over returning rehydrated objects back to archive tier with support for daysAfterLastTierChangeGreaterThan.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Container Storage for Ephemeral (Local NVMe/Temp SSD) and Azure Disk
item.description: Azure Container Storage, industry’s first platform-managed container-native storage solution in the public cloud, is now generally available with full support for Ephemeral Disks (Local NVMe/Temp SSD) and Azure Disks.

item.title: Generally Available: IT Service Management Connector (ITSMC) is now certified with ServiceNow Washington version
item.description: We are certifying IT Service Management Connector (ITSMC) on Washington version of ServiceNow.

item.title: Retirement: Azure Synapse Runtime for Apache Spark 2.4 Disablement
item.description: Effective August 15th, 2024, disablement of jobs running on Azure Synapse Runtime for Apache Spark 2.4 will be executed.

item.title: Generally Available: vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB integration with Semantic Kernel (.NET)
item.description: Support for .NET integration with Semantic Kernel in vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB.

item.title: Public Preview: Long-term retention for CMK-enabled Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server
item.description: Configure long-term retention for CMK-enabled Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Servers.

item.title: Generally Available: Storage autogrow replica support
item.description: Enable storage autogrow for read replicas in Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server.

item.title: Generally Available: Vaulted backup for Azure Blob Storage
item.description: Vaulted backup for Azure Blob Storage, now generally available, can help you comprehensively protect your data in Azure Blob Storage against data loss.

item.title: Retirement: Upgrade your Azure Logic Apps Integration Service Environment workloads
item.description: As we near the August 31, 2024, deadline, it has become imperative for you to complete your upgrade from Integration Service Environments (ISE) to Logic Apps Standard.

item.title: Retirement: Upgrade from Azure API Management stv1 to stv2 by Aug. 31, 2024
item.description: The August 31st deadline to upgrade from Azure API Management stv1 to stv2 is rapidly approaching. After this date, your stv1 platform will no longer receive the latest updates and additional features available in stv2.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure API Management WordPress plugin enables customers to build highly customizable developer portals
item.description: Azure API Management is announcing a new WordPress plugin to enable our customers to easily deploy a highly customizable developer portal on WordPress hosted on Azure App Service. Customers can now take advantage of site capabilities in WordPress to customize and add features to API Management developer portal including localization, collapsible and expandable menus, custom stylesheets, file downloads, and more.
